quote: Far from checking the spread of immorality, repression has always extended and deepended it. Thus it is futile to oppose it by rigorous legislation which trespasses on individual liberty.
quote_letters: FAR FROM CHECKING THE SPREAD OF IMMORALITY REPRESSION HAS ALWAYS EXTENDED AND DEEPENDED IT THUS IT IS FUTILE TO OPPOSE IT BY RIGOROUS LEGISLATION WHICH TRESPASSES ON INDIVIDUAL LIBERTY
